name: The glowing adventure
description:
A hand drawn 2d platformer made for the LD45 jam

The theme was "Start with nothing"

The game is a little short, so it also has an endless mode at the end

Controls --> Movement - Arrow keys/WASD

                            Jump             -  Space bar

                            Attack          - Left mouse button or E

Jump and attack wont be available at the start of the game. You will get these abilities later.
